verses.name: Acts 15:18
verses.text: Known unto God are all his works from the beginning of the world.

verses.name: Acts 15:19
verses.text: Wherefore my sentence is, that we trouble not them, which from among the Gentiles are turned to God:

verses.name: Acts 15:20
verses.text: But that we write unto them, that they abstain from pollutions of idols, and from fornication, and from things strangled, and from blood.

verses.name: Acts 15:21
verses.text: For Moses of old time hath in every city them that preach him, being read in the synagogues every sabbath day.
